name: Man's Best Friend (Cathulhu Studios)
description:
A game about the inextricable relationship between man and dog

Arrow keys to move and turn dog. Make it to the goal without touching any objects.

PS: Really sorry about the music compression and some of the bugs such as the cars not moving after the lights turn green for them. I tried very hard to fix all of that, but I'm a beginner to game development, and the deadline loomed too near.

Hope you enjoy the game.
